contents.text: Thank you for calling Disqus, based in San Francisco, helping publishers increase engagement and build loyal audiences.
Press 1 for Sales and Partnerships to learn about our B2B solutions.
Press 1 to speak with our New Business Sales team.
Please hold while we connect you to New Business Sales.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and sign-up details for a new enterprise Disqus solution
I'm interested in pricing and features for a new Disqus enterprise package for my veteran-focused publication.
I want to discuss enterprise API licensing and performance for a new B2B integration.
I’d like to set up a new Disqus account for my community newsletter and learn about your business plans.
Inquire about enterprise plans and integration options for deploying Disqus on my university physics departmental website.

contents.text: Press 2 to follow up on your Existing Account.
Please hold while we connect you to your Account Manager.

navigationGoals: Explore options to upgrade our existing Disqus account
I want to upgrade my existing Disqus plan to support more moderation seats for my veteran community.
I want to review my existing account's API usage quotas and renewal options.
I need to review my current Disqus subscription and possibly change my plan.
Adjust my current academic subscription to add advanced moderation features and increase user seats.

contents.text: Press 1 for Technical Support with Disqus integration.
Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a Disqus integration error on our site
I need help fixing Disqus comments not appearing on my veteran resource website.
I want to troubleshoot Disqus embed JavaScript integration issues on my site.
I’m having trouble with Disqus comments not showing on my personal blog and need technical help.
Troubleshoot Disqus embedding on my research blog so that MathJax-rendered equations display correctly.

contents.text: Press 2 for Billing and Account Inquiries.
Please hold while we connect you to our Billing team.

navigationGoals: Obtain the latest invoice and update our payment method
I need to update the payment details on my Disqus account for my nonprofit veterans blog.
I want to resolve a billing discrepancy on my latest invoice and update my payment method.
I noticed an unfamiliar charge on my Disqus bill and want to clarify and fix it.
Review and obtain a detailed breakdown of my latest invoice and update the billing information for our department.
